body.p: Guests can read data but are not allowed to create new database objects or edit them. Guests will not be able to see the database objects with a visibility status set to Reader, Group, or Project if no status ( Reader / Updater) has been assigned to them.
However, guests can view the content of a particular corpus, even if no user status has been provided. Similarly, guests can view the Lemma list and the Thesaurus database, but not modify them.
